Reviews.Title: Its worth its weight in gold, as long as its under $340
Reviews.Author: cabernhardt
Reviews.Content: I bought this particular laptop from a different vendor (starts with W and ends with T), but overall it works great. Has more memory than I could ever need. Hasn't acted up or froze (which is a common Acer problem). Windows 8 is kind of goofy, really miss Vista, but theres a way to disable 8 and go back to Vista or 7. Intel processor super fast, use this computer to shop on amazon and run my miles (Im a truckdriver).

Reviews.Title: Some of the features are more than I expected
Reviews.Author: sj harris
Reviews.Content: Gateway 15.6" Laptop 4GB 320GB | NE56R31uWhen I purchased this I was looking for something with great graphics, wide keyboard, and lightweight. I must say I have all that plus a good amount of memory...The con of this product the speakers SUCK! I have to order a portable because at the highest volume you still barely can hear, and when I am watching movies or videos I want to hear, also I love to play Sims 3 and I have to be able to enjoy my game time.I would say this is a product I don't regret purchasing, my teenager is asking for it since day one.

Reviews.Title: My gateway laptop review
Reviews.Author: franciscohurtado
Reviews.Content: when I got this computer I was expecting all the exact details like on the amazon listing and it didn't exactly have the same specifics the listing said it had 320 GB but this one had 270GB so that ticked me off but the rest met the exact specifics its just im the type of person who wants to get their moneys worth and I don't think I really got it so becarefull and if u can contact the seller to see the exact specifics of the items f

Reviews.Title: Looks great Works great
Reviews.Author: Tommy A. Bird "wordytom"
Reviews.Content: However, I shall give it away and go for a Kindle with keyboard because of space problems. I'll probably end up giving it to someone who will be able to use it. Here in Muskogee, this lap top will be a godsend to some kid who can't afford one. This will be the greatest gift he or she will get this year.

Reviews.Title: Gateway laptop
Reviews.Author: Jeff Langelier
Reviews.Content: Battery went bad in first week we had it. Operationally it's fine.  Good speed. No real other issues as if yet.

Reviews.Title: Weak Hinge Support
Reviews.Author: Cory J. Bricker
Reviews.Content: We've had our Gateway NE56R31u for less than 2 years now and the plastic support that the left hinge screws into has broken.  The hinge is super tight so when you open the lid day after day it puts lots of tension on the plastic support which I discovered is poorly made. Also the plastic support that holds the power jack to the case on the left side is poorly made as well and has broken from normal plugging and unplugging. We first noticed the plug was lose but it was still charging so we didn't think much about it. However, eventually from the constant wiggling when plugging and unplugging, the ground wire soldered to the jack broke.  Luckily I found a cheap replacement power jack which I plan to hot glue in place but I'm still contemplating how I'm going to fix the hinge mounts.  The laptop is good but I just want people to be aware of what to expect after daily use of a cheap laptop.

Reviews.Title: Just outstanding
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: There were som minor issues with the shipping. (Mostly at my own error) in which the Immediately refunded part of the Shipping.And when the product arrived to my home the chager Did not Work. they immediately gave me funds for a new this Company is OUTSTANDING in customer service I recommend these guys to anyone. Now to the actual Product the computer is Wonderful plays the games I play at decent speed and it is wonderful for school work

Reviews.Title: BUYER BE WARE...Item does NOT work and NO customer service response!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Broke Laptop
Reviews.Content: The Item arrived 6% charged. Prompted to charge the laptop, I did so, only the charger does NOT charge the laptop, neither do any other chargers I tried, so the laptop hardware CLEARLY has a problem. They had to have known this BEFORE shipping it out.So now i am sitting here $220 out of pocket and NO laptop? I contacted the seller and received an automated reply that said they will contact me with-in 48 hours. It has been 3 days and yet still no-response? Hence this review.I also found this YouTube video of another buyer who had the same issue with another item he bought from EZCORP. Here is the YouTube link: [...]So BUYER BE WARE!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: speaker problems?
Reviews.Author: ron
Reviews.Content: i got this laptop for a steal a year and half ago at walmart for 289!!!! i read alot of people are having problems with the speakers.... i did also. i went into the audio properties and used the enhancement equalizer. the speakers work fine now. it sems the problem is with the software and not the actual speakers. if i use vlc media player and fool around with the boost I even get some bass distortion

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Marshal pool
Reviews.Content: i got this for my mom and sister and they enjoy the and i got both of them for a grate price
